revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Z-Com |model=AC-1027 |revision=-I |fcc_date=01/08/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=M4Y-AC1027I |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Z-Com AC-920 <!--ZMP-16110053--> |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=IP41 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:19:70 |oui_eth=00:19:70 }} :{{ProductPage|http://www.zcom.com.tw/program1/product_showtext.asp?infoid=U$jC$cE|u&cmd=1}} {{â€¢}} [http://www.zcom.com.tw/program1/product_showtext.asp?infoid=U$jC$cE|u&cmd=1 Product page]
The FCC internal photos appear to show a CPU which is capable of 3x3:3 but only wired for 2x2:2.
This device may use a QCA9558 + QCA9980 like the AC-1027O [https://www.slideshare.net/RajeshKapoor7/zcom-wireless-products-application-overview supposedly does] (Slide #21).
{{FCC ST|07/07/2018|indexme.}}
===See also=== *[[Z-Com AC-1027-I]] - AC1600 Dual Band Concurrent Wireless AP *[[Z-Com AC-1027L]] - AC750 Dual Band Wireless Ceiling AP *[[Z-Com AC-1028]] - Dual Band Concurrent Wireless In-Wall AP *[[Z-Com AC-1031]] - Dual Band Concurrent Wireless Wave2 AP
